ALL PEOPLE SAYING THIS DOESN\'T WORK ARE COMPLETE FUCKTARDS. nnThe Noobish has put alot of work into this, and it DOES WORK, NO VIRUSES, NOTHING.nnThe problem is that it is in RUSSIAN. And this is easily overcome.nnNow, when you download the files in the torrent, and run the setup, it is initially in Russian. However, a few screens across you\'re presented with a drop down menu in which you select the launguage. If you have Russian charecters installed on your system then it will appear as \'Aengelski\' or something like that. It is the only other option/second option on the drop down menu. YOU CANT MISS IT!nnChoosing this then Installing, mounting the image in Daemon tools (NOTE, When choosing the image to mount, YOU MUST take off daemon tools file filter to find the correct one, this is done by selecting All Files (*.*) at the drop down menu near the bottom) and selecting the file which is the biggest.)nnOnce this is done, Right click on the BattlefrontII.exe and run it. If it crashes on startup, run it in compatibility for windows 95. (from properties)nnIF IT DOESNT WORK AT THIS POINT YOU SHOULD QUIT THE INTERNETS.

Despite smaller seeder swarms I picked this up in about 20 minutes, and everything is working great.  Managed to work out the instructions Tombraideraddict gave, even if they're confusing as hell (Sorry man, no offense but telling ppl to quit the net after a run-on-sentence with random filler consonants made me lol)  Just do this.  

1)Run Setup.exe
2)Find the only pulldown menu in the russian installer, the enlish option is the second and only other option.
3)If you use Poweriso or something alternative to dameontools, just compile setup1, and 2 into a .daa or .iso file with your program, and mount it.  (The torrent didn't provide a no-cd crack, so you're riding old school.)
4)Copy and replace the Game Data folder into your game directory, and hopefully it should work.  

I hope this helps someone, GL and buy the game if you enjoy it!

(Like all cracked games, online play is for paying customers only)
